conversation.text: Based on your preference cues, I would recommend "Mansfield Park" which is based on a novel by Fanny Burnett and features a talented actress like Jennifer Jason Leach who plays the lead role of Elizabeth MP. This movie tells the story of a wealthy heiress named ElizabethMP who moves into her father's mansion in London with her maid MariaMP. ElizabethMP soon becomes obsessed with money and power, and begins to cheat on her husband, Sir RobertMP. This eventually leads to Sir RobertMP leaving ElizabethMP and returning home with his family. ElizabethMP is left alone in the mansion, and soon becomes obsessed with finding out who her real father is and how she can get back at ElizabethMP for cheating on her husband. This eventually leads to ElizabethMP meeting a former colleague named Mr. JohnMP who was once engaged to ElizabethMP's sister MariaMP. Mr. JohnMP tells ElizabethMP about his encounter with MariaMP in the past, and suggests that maybe there is still some love between MariaMP and Mr. JohnMP after they stopped being engaged to each other.
